OS-SECTION2-BODY: It'll be love at "first try" with our incredible product lines of advanced skin care, trendy colors, luxurious toiletries plus exclusive women and men's fragrances. The best part?  You can earn up to 50% commission on your product sales - one of the highest commissions in the industry!
OS-SECTION3-BODY: JAFRA's lets you sell your way. Set your own hours, plan work around your family and achieve financial independence doing what you love.
OS-SECTION4-BODY: Set your own goals to earn exciting gifts, amazing trips, and free JAFRA beauty products.
OS-SECTION5-QUOTE1: It's easy for me to sell JAFRA because I'm so passionate about all the products! They're such great quality.
OS-SECTION5-QUOTE2: JAFRA has given me the opportunity to earn more money! Plus the sky’s the limit! I can earn as much as I want!
OS-SECTION5-QUOTE3: I love the freedom JAFRA gives me. I spend more time with my family because I can choose my own schedule.
OS-Q1: Q. What does it mean to be a JAFRA Consultant?
OS-A1: You’re out there as our representative selling JAFRA’s excellent products directly to customers at hosted parties, casual get-togethers, wherever you like or online. It’s up to you! Plus, you’re now part of a global group of smart women living strong and purposeful lives. You believe in friendship and finding passion in what you do. JAFRA provides the path for you to turn your potential into the successful life you can only imagine.
OS-Q2: Q. What do I need to know about JAFRA products?
OS-A2:
It’s easy to share, show, and sell JAFRA products because they are so fabulous for head-to-toe beauty.
Skin Care: Besides our legendary Royal Jelly line, we also feature other innovative breakthrough skin care such as Advanced Dynamics regimens and JAFRA PRO concerns products.
Fragrances: JAFRA scents are developed by world-renowned European perfumers who know that a fragrance must create memories, evoke moments in time, and reflect your personality.
Color: Choose from flawless-look foundations, full coverage lipsticks in luscious colors, high fashion eyeshadows, and eyeliners, and must-have nail lacquers.
Toiletries: You’ll be proud to sell JAFRA’s luxurious and irresistible aromatic body and hair care products. No one is forgotten because there are toiletry lines created for the entire family.
OS-Q3: Q. How do I begin to share JAFRA products?
OS-A3: Simply make a list of your friends, family, and neighbors, and give them a call or contact them on social media. Let them know you’re now a JAFRA Consultant, and that you want to show them the beauty of JAFRA products. Everyone wants to look their most beautiful, so you’ll have interested people right away!
OS-Q4: Q. How much can I expect to earn?
OS-A4: You’re the CEO of your business so you decide! You can earn up to 50% personal commissions on sales. The more you sell, the more you’ll earn! Plus, you’ll receive great rewards from JAFRA in the form of glamour getaways, free product, jewelry, and other terrific incentive gifts.
OS-Q5: Q. How will I get paid?
OS-A5: You have two options. Payments are made: 1) Via Direct Deposit into your checking account 2) Loaded onto a JAFRA Debit MasterCard.  Be sure to select an option immediately upon joining JAFRA so you won’t miss a payment!
OS-Q6: Q. Will I receive training from JAFRA?
OS-A6: Yes! Remember you may be in business for yourself but you’re not by yourself! In no time, you’ll be a JAFRA expert with our convenient and powerful online training featuring webcasts, videos, tools you can download and more. Your JAFRA Manager can also help you learn so be sure to ask your Manager about monthly team meetings. There are also training events where thousands of Consultants come together for advanced training and to learn about business opportunities.
OS-Q7: Q. Do I need to work a certain amount of hours?
OS-A7: No to that. You’re the boss so you decide how much time you spend on your JAFRA business. You can think of it as a full time career or a part time one. Either way, you get to schedule the time for your personal life or for your family.
OS-Q8: Q. Do I need to achieve a minimum number of sales?
OS-A8: We have a rule for this one: To remain a JAFRA Consultant, you are required to place at least $300 or more in retail orders in a 12-month period. With all the wonderful JAFRA products that people will want, you’re sure to find it easy to meet this quota.
OS-Q9: Q. How much do I have to invest?
OS-A9: You can purchase our Royal Starter Kit for $99 plus shipping and handling.  It has everything you need to succeed. Look for Quick Start kits at a lower price of as little as $39.
OS-Q10: Q. Does JAFRA offer a product guarantee?
OS-A10: Of course! It’s a no muss, no fuss guarantee! We want happy Consultants and Customers who are 100% satisfied. So we offer free, no-hassle returns and exchanges within 6 months of a product’s purchase date.
OS-Q11: Q. How is JAFRA different from other direct sales cosmetic companies?
OS-A11: Founded in 1956 in Malibu, California, by Jan and Frank Day, JAFRA has over 58 years in helping women achieve the life they imagine.  Over 500,000 Consultants sell our products in 20 countries.  Plus, JAFRA is ranked in the top 25 direct sales companies in the United States.
